<small>Hebrew form: [[H4898]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיזִב‎</span> **verb** ==deliver== (probably **Shaph\`el** as loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šûzub(u), ušêib***</u></abbr>, ***deliver***, √ <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ezêbu***</u></abbr> (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎א‎</span><sub>4</sub> = <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עזב‎</span>), [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 140</sup> [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>GGN 1583, 91</sup>; BAS i.13 [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 43, l, Anm</sup>.; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיזֵב‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 203</sup>, also Nabataean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שיזב‎</span> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>255</sup>; compare proper name <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵל‎</span> Biblical Hebrew; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צלמשזב‎</span> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>102</sup>; see also following article); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיזִב‎</span> [[Dan.3.28|Dan 3:28]]; [[Dan.6.28|Dan 6:28]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְשֵׁיזִ֑ב‎</span> [[Dan.3.17|Dan 3:17]] suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְשֵׁיזְבִנָּךְ‎</span> [[Dan.6.17|Dan 6:17]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְִ֯כבוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.3.13|Dan 3:13]] ***Infinitive*** suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְשֵׁיזָבוּתָךְ‎</span> [[Dan.6.21|Dan 6:21]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵתּ‎</span>- v.[[Dan.6.15|Dan 6:15]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַ֑נָּא‎</span>- [[Dan.3.17|Dan 3:17]] — ***deliver*** (usually with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִן‎</span>): [[Dan.3.17|Dan 3:17]]b, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of person v[[Dan.3.28|Dan 3:28]]; [[Dan.6.28|Dan 6:28]]b, suffix person [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]]; [[Dan.3.17|Dan 3:17]]a; [[Dan.6.15|Dan 6:15]]; [[Dan.6.17|Dan 6:17]]; [[Dan.6.21|Dan 6:21]], absolute v.[[Dan.6.28|Dan 6:28]]a.
